title: Mathematics Learning Design Competency Enhancement Course Using IMS-LD

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education-level mathematics knowledge and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented training program for designing learning activities in smartphone environments and applying the IMS-LD standard.

learning_goals: Visualization of learning flows in secondary mathematics units using UML activity diagrams
Systematic implementation of math curriculum instructional design by applying IMS-LD elements
Design of learning activities optimized for smartphone-based LMS in resource-constrained technical environments
Continuous improvement of math learning design effectiveness using formative assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
